## Version

- [ ] V2 Documentation (`/v2/docs/`)

- [ ] GitHub Documentation (`/.github/`)

## Issue Type

- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Incorrect/outdated information
- [ ] Unclear/confusing content
- [ ] Broken links
- [ ] Typos/grammar
- [ ] Missing examples
